alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:41PM CDT until June 12 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 441 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bassfield, or 9 miles southeast of Prentiss, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Melba around 500 PM CDT. Sumrall around 515 PM CDT. Sanford around 530 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
